Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Agendas & Minutes](https://stanwoodwa.portal.civicclerk.com/)

   Access easily searchable meeting agendas and minutes for various boards, commissions, and committees.
2. #### [Title VI](https://stanwoodwa.org/530/Title-VI)
3. #### [Boards & Commissions](https://stanwoodwa.org/311/Boards-Commissions)

   Peruse boards and commissions of Stanwood.
4. #### [Departments](https://stanwoodwa.org/149/Departments)

   Get information regarding the departments dedicated to keeping the community moving.
5. #### [Mayor & City Council](https://stanwoodwa.org/194/Mayor-City-Council)

   Meet your mayor and City Council. Find government meeting documents and City Council committee information.
6. #### [Municipal Code](https://stanwood.municipal.codes/)

   View the Stanwood Municipal Code online.
7. #### [Ordinances, Proclamations & Resolutions](https://stanwoodwa.org/407/Ordinances-Proclamations-Resolutions)

   Access City of Stanwood ordinances, resolutions, and proclamations.
8. #### [City Hall and Police Station Renovation](https://stanwoodwa.org/599/City-Hall-and-Police-Station-Renovation)

   Visit this page for information and updates about the city hall and police station remodel
9. #### [Strategic Plan](https://stanwoodwa.org/1629/Strategic-Plan)

   Visit this page to learn about the city's five-year strategic plan

* [Utility Billing](https://stanwoodwa.org/168/Billing-Rates---Water-Sewer-Drainage)

* [Parks & Facilities](https://stanwoodwa.org/210/Parks-Recreation)

* [Online Permits](https://stanwood.portal.iworq.net/portalhome/stanwood)
